casebody.data:
In re Austin’s Estate. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. November 23, 1888.) Appeal from surrogate’s court, New York county; R. S. Ransom, Surrogate. The facts of this case are the same as In re Austin’s Estate, supra, except that the order in this case was for the payment to respondent, Winifred Osborn, of §500, in anticipation of the income of her legacy.

Argued before Van Brunt, P. J., and Brady and Macomber, JJ.

Henry L. Sprague, for appellant. Henry B. Hathaway, for respondent, Van Brunt, P. J.

The same disposition must be made of this appeal as was made of that upon the appeal from the order in favor of Leonidas Osborn, (supra.)

Macomber and Brady, JJ., concur.
